tags.name: zui-slider
tags.description: Prototype - Use at your own risk

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Represents the value of the input. Can be set to a default value, and will reflect the value provided by the user when interactive with the control

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Represents the stepping interval, used both for user interface and validation purposes

attributes.name: no-text
attributes.description: Represents that this control must be filled in for form submission

properties.name: value
properties.description: Represents the value of the input. Can be set to a default value, and will reflect the value provided by the user when interactive with the control

properties.name: valueAsNumber
properties.description:
Returns the value of the element, interpreted as one of the following, in order:
A number
NaN if conversion is impossible

properties.name: step
properties.description: Represents the stepping interval, used both for user interface and validation purposes

properties.name: noText
properties.description: Represents that this control must be filled in for form submission
